name: PRyC WP: AntiSPAM (without CAPTCHA)
author: PRyC

sections.description:
Block SPAM without any type of CAPTCHA – plugin add “HoneyTrap” (and a few other tricks) for comment form to block SPAMbots.

Plugin add “HoneyTrap” for comment form to block SPAMbots. Most od SPAM bot fills all comment fields (especially marked as required). plugin also use a few other tricks to eliminate SPAM from spambots.

Work fine for all my and my client site ðŸ™‚

Plug will not stop people writing comments – to block this type of spam additionally install eg. Akismet or Antispam Bee.
sections.installation:
1. Upload pryc-wp-antyspam dir to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.5.0

  • Add: Sanitize Author HTML Tag (optional, but recommended)

1.4.1

  • Modification of some default text

1.3.1

  • Add XML-RPC block option

1.2.5

  • Add TXT with HoneyTrap field (if comment move to SPAM)

1.2.4

  • Add TXT to comment moved to SPAM by plugin

1.2.1

  • Fake value (content remove by JS)

1.1.1

  • Hide field from CSS to CSS+JS

1.0.1

  • First public ver.
